meanings.definition: Used to refer to a male person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
meanings.sent1: Tom saw a cat, and he petted it gently.
meanings.sent2: He is a good boy who always helps his friends.
meanings.sent3: The dog thought he was the king of the house, demanding treats all day.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood tall and proud, as if he had witnessed centuries of history.
meanings.sent5: When the storm hit, he bravely protected his family from harm.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to a male person or animal that is being discussed or is present.
meanings.sent1: He is the one who fixed the broken fence yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The lion roared loudly as he approached his prey.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought he could outsmart the clever fox.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone brightly, as if he wanted to light up the whole world.
meanings.sent5: In the dark forest, he felt a sense of adventure and excitement.
